socializer.core

Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • socializer.core.UserManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminManager, PersonManager, ResearcherManager

    public abstract class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object
    User access point for application functionality
    Author:
    Oleksandr Grygorenko (a1601931)

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserManager

        protected UserManager(java.lang.String email,
                      java.lang.String password)
               throws java.rmi.AccessException,
                      java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Performs user's login.
        Parameters:
        email - user's email
        password - user's password
        Throws:
        java.rmi.AccessException - if given credentials are invalid
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if connection to the database has not been initialized

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init()
        Initializes connection to the application database. Must be (once) executed prior to instantiating the class.

      • destroy

        public static void destroy()
        Terminates the connection to the application database. Must be executed after usage of all class instances. After that, no instances should be created.

      • close

        public void close()
        Terminates current UserManager instance session

      • getPerson

        public Person getPerson(java.lang.String personalLink)
                 throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
        Retrieves a person of the given personal link
        Parameters:
        personalLink - person's personal link
        Returns:
        person with the given personal link
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if no person of such a personal link is registered

        Retrieves a post of the given ID
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        post of the given ID
